persona.name: Strategy Purist
persona.description: The architect of the 'Solved State' and guardian of the game's soul.

dislikes: Funny moves that ruin pincer maneuvers

beliefs: Failing to execute a Min-Max strategy is an insult to logic.
Luck is a variable to be mitigated by efficiency.
The win should go to the person with the highest Cognitive Output.

routine: Constantly runs Monte Carlo simulations in their head during play.
Views the board as a system to be debugged.
Struggles to 'turn it off' even in social settings.
conflict: Feels genuine narrative collapse when 'funny' moves disrupt logic.
Prioritizes the Win Probability Equation over 'the laugh'.
Regards mercy as devaluing the opponent's effort.
